attributes.additional_details:
Because I’m sick and tired of the abuse ! 
WE ARE PEOPLE ! 
All different shapes colours and sizes ! 
We should not be hated and discriminated for the job we CHOOSE TO DO
attributes.background:
Stop Hate against sexworkers 
Online abuse against us ! 
Social media platforms need to support us aswell ! By not taking down our socials ! When we do nothing wrong !

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about abuse against sex workers, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

Decisions about policies on permissible content on social media platforms are a matter for individua social media companies, not the UK Government or Parliament.

If you are receiving abuse on a social media platform, or believe your account has been incorrectly taken down, you should complain to the relevant social media platform.
